lead_paragraph: With a burst of power on the steep final slopes of the imposing Mont Ventoux, Chris Froome sprinted away from a young climbing sensation and gained more than a minute and a half on his two closest rivals.
snippet: With a burst of power on the steep final slopes of the imposing Mont Ventoux, Chris Froome sprinted away from a young climbing sensation and gained more than a minute and a half on his two closest rivals.
